name: Orb Trials
description:
Orb Trials is a unique and beautiful physics based puzzle and platformer. Navigate your orb while dodging lasers, pushing helper cubes, carrying helper spheres, opening doors, extending bridges, creating stairs, and using gravity to get to the level exit! Featuring 16 free levels, and over 40 unlockable levels, Orb Trials offers an ever increasing challenge for all players!

*** Features ***
- 60 Levels that gradually introduce the player to more complex features

- Use helper cubes and spheres to assist you with opening doors, extending bridges, and even as weights in physics puzzles

- Fantastic graphics

- Frequently encounter new challenges and concepts
